responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "BB113A9C4FD22A6695F4008C66CF1A43", "Lost Mage has returned and united the rogues of these hills into a formidable foe. He is surely after the artifact and will utulize it in malice. The lost one has power and aside from his fiery missiles, he threatens to turn us all to swine should we not give the star to him. I believe him for even now I have heard the rally cries of my academy guards be replaced by the grunts of hogs. Find the Lost One and his bandits and destroy the Star of Blinding Light or the entire Kaealar Empire will ")
name: MADD_0005A_SNB_FinalNote_6
